data.actual_result: Mobile push notification doesnt switch off on mobile even if u have it synced with desktop
data.expected_result: Mobile push notification button should sync like it does on desktop
data.short_description: Mobile push notifications dont switch off when muting a server like it does on desktop (must have sync across clients on)
data.steps_to_repro: - go to any server (like Discord Testers) > on mobile - click on the server name so it opens the notifications settings etc. - click on notification settings (now u should see mute {server name etc. on mobile) turn mobile push notifications on - switch to desktop - open the notification server settings (on desktop) - Mute (for example: Discord Testers) and notice mobile push notifications turns off - go back to your mobile (you should have notification settings still open) - mute discord testers server on desktop and notices mobile push notifications button doesnt switch off
